name.description: The name of the element template.

id.description: The identifier of the element template.

description.description: The description of the element template.

version.description: Optional version of the template. If you add a version to a template it will be considered unique based on its ID and version. Two templates can have the same ID if their version is different.

isDefault.description: Indicates whether the element template is a default template.

appliesTo.description: List of BPMN types the template can be applied to.

errorMessage.pattern: invalid item for "appliesTo", should contain namespaced property, example: "bpmn:Task"

elementType.description: The BPMN type the element will be transformed into.

errorMessage.pattern: invalid item for "elementType", should contain namespaced property, example: "bpmn:Task"

metadata.description: Some custom properties for further configuration.

entriesVisible.description: Select whether non-template entries are visible in the properties panel.
